description:
BTCN is a social experiment and financial case study to measure the feasibility of a deflationary currency.

There were originally 500000 BTCN in existence.

The intention is not to be used for day-to-day transactions, but rather as a decentralized hedge against traditional inflationary instruments. Through a system of immutable smart contracts and continuous destruction, BTCN is the world’s first self-destructing currency.
name: Bitcoin Neo
